content: That’s a good point, AI is certainly going to continue growing in relevance and application. Two things that will keep slowing its advance in human engagement, though, are time — both processing and latency — and the limitations of the physical interface (which is where that Radio Shack book came in handy). The latter is a big deal because humans are trapped inside cages of physical I/O. Except for the telepaths among us, of course.
